sourcesContent:
Submit User Details

Enter your name here
Name is required.
Address is required.


import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AddUserRequest } from '../../appmodels/adduser.model'; import { UserService } from '../../services/user.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { model: AddUserRequest; message!: string; result!: string; constructor(private userService: UserService, private router: Router) { this.model = { name: '', address: '' }; } ngOnInit() { // You can initialize anything if needed here } AddUser(form: any) { // Ensure form is valid before submitting if (form.valid) { this.userService.addUser(this.model).subscribe({ next: (response: any) => { this.result = response; // Optionally, navigate to a different route or reset the form // this.router.navigate(['/some-route']); }, error: (error: any) => { console.error("Error occurred while adding user: ", error); this.message = "Failed to add user. Please try again."; // Optional message for user feedback } }); } else { this.message = "Please fill in the required fields."; } } }
